summary.para: Gets the next object in the enumeration.

param.name: pia
param.para: A pointer to an interface reference variable that returns the next application object. Note that the category of the application object returned must match that passed into .

returns.para: Returns S_OK if an item is returned, S_FALSE if there are no more items to enumerate, a COM-defined error value otherwise.

remarks.para: Note is not a standard enumeration interface. It does not support a Skip method, nor does its Next method support retrieval of multiple items.

summary.para: Resets the enumeration of objects to the first item.

remarks.para: Note is not a standard enumeration interface.
It does not support a Skip method nor does its Next method support retrieval of multiple items.

summary.para: Exposes methods that enumerate published applications to Add/Remove Programs in the Control Panel. The object exposing this interface is requested through .

remarks.para: To publish applications to Add/Remove Programs in the Control Panel, you must support IEnumPublishedApps, and .
